description:
This video was sponsored by Good Good Good. Go to https://www.goodgoodgood.co/goodnewspaper/complexly?via=scishow to get your first Goodnewspaper for just $5 and can cancel any time.

If all goes well, we'll be sending astronauts back to the Moon in just a couple of years. And scientists have a lot to figure out before then, including the answer to a seemingly simple question: What time is it up there?

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: What Time Is It on the Moon?
